com.skysql.monitor
Class deltaMonitor

java.lang.Object
  com.skysql.monitor.monitor
      com.skysql.monitor.deltaMonitor

public class deltaMonitor
extends monitor

The deltaMonitor is an monitor class that monitors SQL values, the recorded value is the difference from the previous value monitored and the current monitor.

Author:
Mark Riddoch
